critical_learnings.authentication: PAT must be base64-encoded for basic auth
critical_learnings.deduplication: Error signatures normalize variable parts for matching
critical_learnings.search_limitation: GitHub API has pagination issues beyond 100 results
critical_learnings.error_format: Unity errors follow File(line,col): error CODE: message pattern

next_steps.day_5: Integration Framework - Build configuration system and templates
